My Story

üëãüèΩ
Hello, my name is Krubel but you can call me Kru! I am a UX designer that loves to code. In this portfolio, you will find some of my best projects. I specifically selected these projects to show how well-rounded I am. Take a look around and if you want to talk more you can email me at habteyes83@gmail.com
I consider myself to be a Designer-Developer Liaison. A Designer-Developer Liaison is someone who knows how to code but also understands the design process. This person works closely with designers to help them understand the feasibility of different features. Whether the team is building a web app or a mobile app it will have to be converted into code at some point. To make the developer's life easy designers need to come up with realistic features. A Designer-Developer Liaison can help cultivate a better understanding between designers and developers.
